items.content_html: A lightweight, serverless Telegram bot built with AWS Lambda, OpenAI Assistants API, and Node.js. It processes a simple webhook message, interacts with OpenAI to generate a response, and sends it back via Telegram.

items.content_html: Perception AI â€“ Chrome Extension Perception AI is a lightweight Chrome extension powered by GPT-4 that allows users to ask any question and get instant, AI-generated responses. It integrates the GPT-4 API using RapidAPI and provides a clean, responsive UI built with React and Tailwind CSS.

It integrates the GPT-4 API using RapidAPI and provides a clean, responsive UI built with React and Tailwind CSS.
